rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance with a lobby leading to the living area. The space is designed in accordance with Vastu principles emphasizing natural light from the south side.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen with modern amenities and ventilation openings that align with local building norms. The design also considers Vastu by placing the kitchen in an auspicious zone.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A small guest bedroom designed for occasional visitors with a mini balcony offering a view. Vastu principles have been considered in the positioning to promote positive energy.
